channel.title: Devolution Server - [Trytohaxme]
channel.description:
[size=14pt]Welcome to my Devolution Server![/size]
This is my first ever dodian based server!
.:Features:.
* fixed repeative animations * fixed range up abit * added prefect weapon timers for all weapons * added all weapon animations * fixed npcs glitched hp * Kept the source 100% orginal apart from the updates i added * added support for all bows * added 100% weapon weilding includes all new items * added npc's face players * added player facing npcs * fixed food healing * added all npc animations * added timers on eating, this also adds a wait when eating till the next attack, like real rs * Made a new Pk arena * All bows Have draw backs plus projectiles! * Added Global Object and Deletethatobject!! * added maul special, thanks pk-town * added d long special * added d mace special * added d scimitar special * added dds special, took forever! still not 100% sometimes misses a spec * fixed some bugs like range not hitting, not giving exp * fixed the ::players command screen * added for ranging, if a player hits a 0 with arrows it drops them, so they can pick them back up * added better way of giving starter items * character apperence screen added on first login * 100% pickup add * 100% level requirements added
.:Credits:.
Winten/Bakatool - For Base Killamess - For some updates! Me - For the rest
.:Download:. [url=http://files.filefront.com/Devolution+Serverrar/;12029560;/fileinfo.html]http://files.filefront.com/Devolution+Serverrar/;12029560;/fileinfo.html[/url]

item.title: Devolution Server - [Trytohaxme]
item.dc:creator: @Zh1 Zh
item.description:
@Zh1 wrote:

[quote=“P I M P 3 D Tut, post:44, topic:236073”]Iunno who dug up this topic but I really need to say this.

[quote author=bigh51 link=topic=311428.msg2504753#msg2504753 date=1224876559]

How do you Log in on dodian once you run the server?

Please PM me.

You’re are retarded. I could see that if you said something smarter than your dumb phrase then I wouldn’t care if you dug this up. But know, YOU are freaking stupid and need to go cut your balls off. Thnkz Bye
[/quote]Wow, you’re even more retarded than he is. “You’re are retarded” isn’t proper grammar because you need either you’re or you are, not you’re are. Thnkz isn’t a word, you can’t start a sentence with “but” and you didn’t end your last sentence with a period. Not to mention that “but know, you are freaking stupid” doesn’t make sense. It should be but you should know not but know. You fail at trying to sound smart and trolling.

It IS You’re. You’re = You are.
Your is the proper way of giving possession.
“Hey is that your cat?”
“Why yes. But now he’s dead because you’re a noobfag.”
And please “Bigh 51” Shut the fuck up.
This is the INTERNET. We’re not going to post in perfect grammar.
Now you either need to shut up and deal with it, Or gtfo of the interwebs.

Ontopic,
Notice that all the good sources don’t have pictures?
It’s dodian guys.[/quote]

Lmao ^ true

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution Server - [Trytohaxme]

item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

Iunno who dug up this topic but I really need to say this.

[quote=“bigh51, post:11, topic:236073”][quote author=vic 08 link=topic=311428.msg2504379#msg2504379 date=1224858391]

How do you Log in on dodian once you run the server?

Please PM me.

You’re are retarded. I could see that if you said something smarter than your dumb phrase then I wouldn’t care if you dug this up. But know, YOU are freaking stupid and need to go cut your balls off. Thnkz Bye
[/quote]Wow, you’re even more retarded than he is. “You’re are retarded” isn’t proper grammar because you need either you’re or you are, not you’re are. Thnkz isn’t a word, you can’t start a sentence with “but” and you didn’t end your last sentence with a period. Not to mention that “but know, you are freaking stupid” doesn’t make sense. It should be but you should know not but know. You fail at trying to sound smart and trolling.[/quote]
It IS You’re. You’re = You are.
Your is the proper way of giving possession.
“Hey is that your cat?”
“Why yes. But now he’s dead because you’re a noobfag.”
And please “Bigh 51” Shut the fuck up.
This is the INTERNET. We’re not going to post in perfect grammar.
Now you either need to shut up and deal with it, Or gtfo of the interwebs.

Ontopic,
Notice that all the good sources don’t have pictures?
It’s dodian guys.

Read full topic
